roleset_name: potential belief, expectation, often of something negative

roles.descr: attributive: entity arg1 suspects something of
roles.descr_trans: 定语：实体 arg1 怀疑某事

roleset_name_trans: 潜在的信念、期望，通常是消极的事物

roles.descr: act by which arg0 expresses suspicion, e.g. a glance
roles.descr_trans: arg0 表示怀疑的行为，例如一瞥

roles.descr: thing or event acting in ways that evoke suspicion
roles.descr_trans: 以引起怀疑的方式行事的事物或事件

roleset_name_trans: 可疑的;表现出阴暗、粗略的特征
